𓃟 Schwein = luck

𒌑𒋚𒈾𒁍 ú-šaḫ-na-bu úš-sanibu "sprout, flourish" "schwein haben"

𒃻𒁕;𒃻𒌓𒁕;𒅆𒊑;𒋗𒊒;𒋗𒊑𒈾 šá-da; šá-ud-da; ši-ri; šu-ru; šu-ri-na osud съдба́ sǎdbá ща́стие štástie suwerte suerte sorto sort sors zori zhar szerencse srẹ́ča soartă şans șansă شانس šâns ⇔ Schwein 𓃟 16.180 "good fortune, luck"

𓂋 𓂋 𓇋 𓃟

Corrupted wanderword of the neolithic invention. First domesticated animal after dog (successor of boar hunt).

(Male) Pork > boar, Eber, pig < bzyok porgom Polynesian puaka bacon pòrc puèrc бо́ров bórov beerk फा (phā) pue puaʻa bayi bawi baboy bakas počči purcit 豚 ぶた buta ブタ buta prasa بەراز beraz парсь (parsʹ) ཕག་པ (phag pa) > Ferkel verke ဝက် wak うゎー wā => poco, poor

(Female) Sau(ri/in)
